name.value: FHIR Connectathon 16 - Provider Directory - Scenario 4 - Location Locate Telecom - JSON

description.value: Location search capabilities tests; resource format JSON; validate telecom and physical address; test a FHIR server's Location search operation support using the parameters: name, address, address-city, address-postalcode and address-state. Default values for the search parameters are based on the Location Resource Example and can be modified to allow testing against other known Location resource instances.
